amendment.description: Amendment provides for the inclusion of recent average income and employment data for different levels of educational attainment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in part B of House Report 113-546 to require the inclusion of recent average income and employment data for different levels of educational attainment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Murphy (FL).
